last_episode_to_air.name: For The Children
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sara and Irfan engage in a battle of life and death in India. Arjun is left unaided behind enemy lines. He tries to survive the army protecting Hafeez as he makes his way to where Hafeez is hiding.

name: Zindabaad
overview: Political - action thriller series. The show ups the scale of web originals in the fast filling up competitive space of Indian web originals. It is a show filmed on a massive scale to portray the conflicts of the Indian subcontinent. This show boasts a cast of popular actors Sanaya Irani, Sana Khan, Anirudh Dave, Pankaj Dheer and Vikram Bhatt himself.

episodes.name: No Age For Rage
episodes.overview: Arjun is an worn out ex-raw agent who fights with kids in the nursery school sharing the same society. When these innocent kids become victim of terror attacks, he is forced to get back to his old life.

episodes.name: Old Warrior new Battle
episodes.overview: When Arjun gets back in the business, the ripple spreads across RAW & ISI agency, both hoping that Arjun drops his mission. Sara, Arjun's prodigy at RAW is sent to talk him out of his solo mission.

episodes.name: Beautiful Deceit
episodes.overview: After killing the terrorist who attacked the kids, Arjun follows the trail all the way to Dubai. RAW strives to stop Arjun from leaving India, but Arjun is two steps ahead of them and already in Dubai.

episodes.name: Desert Storm
episodes.overview: Arjun managed to Kidnap Al Maghribi and sneak him under the nose of Benazir Khan and ISI. Benazir vows to kill Arjun. Meanwhile, Sara is called upon by the Prime Minister of India.

episodes.name: Heroes And Villains
episodes.overview: The Hafeez Saleem and his general, Ajmal come out with a plan to get Arjun out of the way. A fatwa is issued on Arjun’s name, and hefty prize money allotted to anyone who kills.

episodes.name: Trust No One
episodes.overview: Sara returns to India. She’s conflicted as she can’t share her secret mission with her husband and RAW officer, Irfan. Irfan realizes there’s something off with Sara and tries to probe.

episodes.name: Lockdowns
episodes.overview: Sara trusted aid is killed inside RAW office. Arjun’s claim about the mole is confirmed. RAW goes under total lockdown until the mole is found. Meanwhile, Hafeez and Ajmal concocts a plan to kill Arjun.

episodes.name: Bargaining People
episodes.overview: Arjun is on a run, with Ajmal’s daughter in his tow. While Benazir and Ajmal are trying their best to catch him, he manages to escape their trap. Meanwhile at RAW, Irfan approaches the local newspaper.

episodes.name: Lamb To The Slaughter
episodes.overview: Finally, Arjun & Ajmal come face to face. Arjun has Ajmal’s daughter with him. Ajmal turns the table by killing his own daughter and shooting Benazir as a part of his plan and escapes.

episodes.name: Bitter Sweet
episodes.overview: ISI confronts Hafeez over the unethical plan. They plan to curb Hafeez’s activities, so he doesn’t cause more damage. Arjun and Benazir hide in a safe house, where they connect despite their ideals.

episodes.name: Now Shera
episodes.overview: Arjun and Benazir arrive in Pakistan to put an end to Hafeez Saleem. They arrive at Ajmal’s hometown, against all the challenges in their way. Sara seeks PM’’s help to get drop support.

episodes.name: Into the Valley of Death
episodes.overview: Sara intentionally leaks Arjun’s information to select RAW Officers including Irfan. ISI attacks at the location, that Sara had shared with Irfan. She is devastated to find out her husband is a traitor.

episodes.name: For The Children
episodes.overview: Sara and Irfan engage in a battle of life and death in India. Arjun is left unaided behind enemy lines. He tries to survive the army protecting Hafeez as he makes his way to where Hafeez is hiding.
